articles.title: Alcohol causes 'seven of every 100 new breast cancer cases in Europe', WHO warns - The Irish News
articles.description: ALCOHOL consumption causes seven of every 100 new breast cancer cases in Europe every year, the World Health Organisation has said.
articles.content:
ALCOHOL consumption causes seven of every 100 new breast cancer cases in Europe every year, the World Health Organisation has said.

articles.title: Irish start-up campaigns to build world's largest database of accessibility information - Echo Live
articles.description: It is estimated that 15 per cent of the world’s population is registered as having a disability, with Europe being home to 135 million people with disabilities.
articles.content:
Irish start up Access Earth has launched a public investment campaign to build the worlds largest database of accessibility information.

articles.title: Springboks will have 'unconventional' water-boy Rassie back on European tour - News24
articles.description: National coach Jacques Nienaber confirmed that Rassie Erasmus will indeed be travelling with the team on their final assignment of 2021, where they'll play three Tests.
articles.content:
• Rassie Erasmus will be travelling with the Springboks on their end-of-year tour to Europe.
